DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to show how well a new device, confocal microscope, works to detect malignant melanoma, a type of skin cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Sensitivity/Specificity Study of Non-invasive Imaging for Melanoma Diagnosis
DOC.criteria: Age 12 or older Patient who has already been selected by their dermatologist for biopsy of a suspicious pigmented lesion and who consents to participate in the study Signed informed consent Age < 12 years
